1.title: Notes from a Killer

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: When a young girl disappears off a quiet suburban street, it marks the beginning of a terrifying game of cat and mouse between police and her abductor.

2.title: Long Sought Truth

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: It takes decades for investigators to follow the evidence to the long-sought-after truth behind the terrifying abduction and murder of 20-year-old Leslie Long, a young mother of three.

3.title: A Different Time

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Police must sift through puzzling evidence and misleading accounts in order to solve a young girl's mysterious disappearance.

4.title: Where's Crystal

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: When a young mother disappears on a busy Fourth of July weekend it marks the beginning of a disturbing mystery, one that will devastate a loving family and tear a small community apart.

5.title: Terror in Waupaca

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: A young girl is abducted while playing outside her grandmother's house.

6.title: Taken From Her Bed

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: An 8-year-old girl disappears from her bedroom in the middle of the night.

7.title: A Bridge Too Far

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Just hours after a popular teenager is reported missing, her lifeless body is discovered under a nearby bridge. Police will have to sort through her puzzling last hours alive to bring a ruthless killer to justice.

8.title: Shifting Stories

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Just hours after a popular teenager is reported missing, her lifeless body is discovered under a nearby bridge. Police will have to sort through her puzzling last hours alive to bring a ruthless killer to justice.

9.title: Terrifying Clues

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: A young woman's late-night call from a pay phone is transformed into the scene of a terrifying abduction.

10.title: Buried Dreams

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: A mother's relentless investigation of her daughter's disappearance leads police to a terrifying string of murders.

11.title: In the Dead of Night

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: Police must retrace a teenager's last known movements if they hope to find out when and where she crossed paths with her killer.

12.title: Lethal Offer

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: A deadly predator leaves a trail of destruction in his wake. Can one teenage girl bring an end to his reign of terror?

13.title: The Depths of Evil

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: As police search for a young mother missing from her home, they never could have imagined the evidence they discovered would put them on the trail of a deadly sexual predator.

14.title: Unchecked Violence

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: When a young mother vanishes her trail goes cold. Until a shocking discovery reveals that history repeats itself.

15.title: No Goodbyes

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: A mother arrives home to have lunch with her teenage daughter and walks into a nightmare she will never forget.

16.title: History Repeats Itself

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: When a young mother vanishes her trail goes cold. Until a shocking discovery reveals that history repeats itself.

17.title: Alone With Evil

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

17.plot: A young mother is strangled to death during her overnight shift at an office building.

1.title: Deadly Lessons

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: A successful lawyer calls 911 reporting that both he and his wife have been shot after being forced off the highway by an unknown assailant. Police investigate and unravel a shocking mystery. #RealPeopleRealStories

2.title: A Murder in Pleasant Valley

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: After a mother is gunned down in a church parking lot, police uncover a tangled web of adultery, deception and corruption that ultimately led to her murder.

3.title: Honeymoon Hit

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: When a beautiful young woman is murdered in her own home, police use high tech equipment and old fashioned police work to bring an unlikely killer to justice.

4.title: Hit or Miss

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: An investigation into a deadly case of mistaken identity reveals a secret love triangle and an underworld web of intrigue.

5.title: Date with Death

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: A woman meets a younger man at a night spot and survives his brutal attack. It triggers a series of investigations and leads to the discovery that a serial killer might be on the loose.

6.title: Death in the Desert

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Legendary Las Vegas casino owner Ted Binion dies under mysterious circumstances. Was it murder or just an accidental drug overdose?

7.title: Love You to Death

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: A husband catches his wife having an affair with a mysterious lover, but just after she ends the affair she winds up dead and police must figure out if it is a tragic accident or murder.

8.title: Millionaire Murder

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: A media mogul calls 911 and says he's been gravely wounded, but has no idea what happened. Police investigate and discover he's been shot. The investigation leads to a shocking motive and sensational trial.

9.title: Last Stop Murder

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: A beautiful and talented woman's charred remains are found in a parking lot. Police race against the clock to discover the killer's identity before he gets away with murder. A minute by minute account of the investigation.

10.title: Out of the Ashes

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: A man is convicted of a murder he says he did not commit. Can he prove he was framed from behind bars?

11.title: Murder at Echo Lake

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: A successful lawyer calls 911 reporting that both he and his wife have been shot after being forced off the highway by an unknown assailant. Police investigate and unravel a shocking mystery.

12.title: Newlywed Murders

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: Two men are convicted of murdering a newlywed couple. One faces the death penalty. Did they really do it or were they victims of small town corruption?

13.title: The Boy Next Door

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: A teenager is discovered murdered on the weekend of the Daytona 500 Race. One year later, police are called to a nearly identical crime scene.

1.title: Beauty and the Beast

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: A beautiful young woman is abducted in broad daylight. Police and her family begin a race against time to find her before its too late.

2.title: Murder in the Heartland

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: A quiet Midwestern community is rocked by a gruesome triple homicide. The unspeakable tragedy robs one man of his mother, grandmother and 5 year old son.

3.title: Twin Killing?

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Twin sisters, Peggy and Betty Lowe are arrested and face separate murder trials in 1993, following the murder of Betty's 55 year old husband. Secrets unfold and a killer comes forward but does that mean that justice will be done?

4.title: A Lamb Amongst Wolves

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: A 19 year old college student is murdered on the street in Brooklyn NY after a night of partying. The mother of the young man convicted of killing him, goes undercover to try and prove her son did not receive a fair trial.

5.title: The Long Road Home

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: When a young college student is found murdered on the side of road, it is the start of a tormenting 26 year journey to justice for her family.

6.title: A Killing in Canova Beach

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: When police find a man found beaten to death on the beach there is a mountain of evidence pointing to Bill Dillon... But is any of it true? Did investigators convict the wrong man?

7.title: She Never Came Home

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: An unsolved murder sends a district attorney down a trail of madness and terror.

8.title: Deadly Delivery

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: Betty Mottinger, a postmaster in Elgin Ohio, is abducted in broad daylight. When her body is discovered 6 weeks later it sets off a cat and mouse game between a career criminal and a postal inspector that may lead to the identity of Betty's killer.

9.title: Web of Lies

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Before police can catch a depraved killer of a 15 year old girl, they must first unravel a puzzling series of lies.

10.title: Daddy's Girl

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: When a wealthy, beautiful young girl is found burnt alive in a dilapidated basement her friends and family are devastated. But out of the ashes, her loving and grief stricken father embarks on a relentless, exhausting search for the truth.

11.title: Beyond Redemption

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: We enter the mind of a cruel and sadistic predator whose acts of wanton violence - and subsequent arrest - are the beginning of a twisted tale of one man's madness and one woman's quest for the truth.

12.title: Twisted Triangle

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: When a beautiful young woman is found murdered out in the New Mexico wilderness, police must unravel her killer's twisted obsession in order to solve the crime.

13.title: Aim to Kill

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: A new father comes home to find his infant son and wife missing. Four months later their bodies are found in a remote wooded area. When police investigate the father's past they find the reason for the unthinkable crime.

1.title: Beauty Queen Killer

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: A man is shot in his living room while his family is upstairs. Guns are scattered all over the lawn, and there's no assailant in sight, but then police get a huge break when they set up an on-camera sting that ultimately leads to a conviction.

2.title: Gallaudet Murders

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: In September 2000, Eric Plunkett - a populat student known for his smile - was mysteriously murdered in his dorm room at Gallaudet University, plunging the campus into a state of shock and terror. Could police stop his killer from striking again?

3.title: Voices in the Dark

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: When a beautiful college freshman is viciously assaulted in her dorm room, Police quickly zero in on a suspect... but when he points the finger at someone else, the search for the truth threatens to tear a small town apart.

4.title: Murder She Wrote

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: When a man is found shot to death in his bedroom, police suspect the author of a threatening series of emails the victim had received. The trail leads them to a jilted lover but will it be enough to prove murder?

5.title: A Cry in the Night

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: When a young woman disappears, police zero in on her violent ex-boyfriend. But the secret to solving the case is buried in a cold case file.

6.title: Cheating Death

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: A woman asks her husband for a divorce but he has a very different plan for how to end their marriage... Which will prove stronger her will to survive or his desire to see her dead?

7.title: Internal Affairs

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: "You've ruined my life! Get on the ground!" were the last words heard by 2007 Colorado murder victim, Heather Lynn Garraus, 35. Since the shooter wore a masked Halloween costume, witnesses could only see a brunette female, fleeing via truck. Within minutes, Shawna Nelson, former 911 dispatcher was summoned and questioned. The motive? She and one-time coworker, Officer Ignacio Garraus, are tangled up in a volatile affair. After Nelson's recent pregnancy (her husband had a vasectomy) the love triangle turned into town gossip. As in a soap opera, accusations of obsession...

8.title: Run Bambi Run

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: A sultry waitress gets fingered for brutally murdering her husband's ex-wife. After her brazen prison escape turns the convicted killer into a national celebrity, questions about the case against her come to light.

9.title: Sins of the Father

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: A mysterious call about a decades-old murder baffles police. As they dig deeper they uncover the monster behind the crime and a son's terrible secret.

10.title: Blood Betrayal

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: A beautiful young mother is savagely murdered in her own home. As police investigate, they discover a dangerous web of intrigue connected to an all American family.

11.title: Shadow of Doubt

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: In Maricopa County, AZ "The Snaggled-Toothed Killer" was convicted on the basis of bite mark evidence - twice. Could he possibly be innocent? If so, how could his pro bono lawyer win his freedom?

12.title: Evil Twin

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: When young girls Jessica Roach,Tricia Reitler, et al., go missing in the Illinois/Indiana/Wisconsin area, police find a suspect. However, despite a positive DNA match, Civil War Reenactor Gary Hall is unlikely to be guilty. He then discloses the reason. His identical twin brother. Larry Hall would possess the same DNA as Gary and also participates in Civil War Reenactments in areas where many girls disappeared. Traditional investigative tactics will reveal if the killer is Larry or Gary, or both. Then, comes speculation of a third-person's involvement.

13.title: Dark Side of a Dream

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: When a young girl goes missing under mysterious circumstances, police must determine if her dreams of fame and Hollywood stardom lead her to tragedy...

1.title: Silenced

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: When a beautiful young woman goes missing, police are baffled. Did she simply run away from a troubled relationship or was her disappearance something far more sinister?

2.title: Message in Blood

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: When police arrive at the scene of a grisly murder, the evidence makes them wonder if the victim's dying act would point them to her killer.

3.title: Race to Judgment

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: When a terrible late-night crash between a pickup truck and an SUV claims the lives of four beautiful high school girls, a small Texas community is torn apart in the search for justice.

4.title: A Tangled Past

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: When a daughter investigates her sick mother's death, she begins to wonder if the cause of her untimely end was really murder.

5.title: Campus Killer

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: When a young girl goes missing from her university campus, her mother is forced to lead an investigation for the truth. Can she find her precious daughter before it's too late?

6.title: Murder by Numbers

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: A small town is outraged when its unofficial mayor is the victim of a vicious attack at work. The police investigation uncovers a number of possible suspects and a confusing trail of evidence but will it lead them to the person who committed the crime?

7.title: Under Suspicion

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: A beloved husband and father is found executed in front of his home.

8.title: A Mother's Nightmare

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: A young mother's mysterious disappearance is the start of one of Memphis' most notorious criminal investigations.

9.title: A Murder at Loose Chippings

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: After a wealthy couple is found dead in their stately Virginia home investigators are taken on a wild journey around the globe before they uncover the shocking truth.

10.title: Betrayal at Charisma Farms

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: When a man is found murdered on the side of the road investigators must unravel a tangled web of intrigue that will test the strength of a family's love.

11.title: Mystery in the Mountains

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: After a young woman disappears from her mountain home, it looks like the case will never be solved. Then, a retired FBI profiler joins the cold case team and jump starts a 13 year old investigation.

12.title: A Slip of Fate

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: A woman is found clinging to the guardrail of a steep embankment. She tells police a harrowing story; two men had attacked her and her husband at gunpoint and now he is missing. Was it a robbery gone wrong or part of a far more sinister plot?

13.title: Murder Ordained?

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: When a young minister's wife is found dead, it appears to be a tragic accident. But then, another member of the congregation is murdered. Police begin to wonder if its just a coincidence or a calculated plot.

1.title: In Broad Daylight

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: A young mother is murdered in broad daylight with her toddler just a few feet away. Police have little to go on except the bizarre description eyewitnesses have given them of the brazen killer.

2.title: Severed Ties

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Chillicothe, MO remains divided over a young man's conviction for the murder of a mother of 5 and the wounding of her husband. Was the bullet fired from his father's gun? How old was the fingerprint on the ammo box? Experts disagreed.

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot:

4.title: No One to Trust

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: After abducting a 17 year old girl in front of her home her kidnapper taunts the family with phone calls and disturbing letters. But a tiny mistake will eventually lead police to his door.

5.title: A Stranger's Knock

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: When firefighters respond to a house fire they discover a woman shot and killed inside. Police must unlock the mystery of who started the blaze to solve the murder.

6.title: Twice Is No Accident

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: John Smith must really be unlucky. Not one, but TWO wives just disappeared. His third wife can't believe what the FBI is telling her.

7.title: Lost in the Fire

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: When a pregnant mother of two is found shot to death in her fire-ravaged home, police find there are more suspects than clues.

8.title: Last Rites

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: In Toledo, OH, a priest is accused of killing a nun 24 years earlier. Can DNA evidence convict or exonerate him?

9.title: Secrets from the Grave

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: After a teenager's partially nude body is discovered brutally beaten in a desolate cemetery, Investigators and her family face an emotional journey to the truth behind her murder.

10.title: Murder at Sunset: Part 1

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: A mother and two daughters are discovered floating in Tampa Bay after a brutal triple homicide. Police must rely on a victim who survived a similar attack to bring the killer to justice in this special two-hour On The Case.

11.title: Murder at Sunset: Part 2

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: A mother and two daughters are discovered floating in Tampa Bay after a brutal triple homicide. Police must rely on a victim who survived a similar attack to bring the killer to justice in this special two-hour On The Case.

12.title: Left in the Dark

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: When a beautiful coed is found stabbed to death, her male roommate is suspected. Once again DNA is the crucial clue.

13.title: The Art of Murder

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: Shelley was a gifted art student in Dallas. When she didn't respond to phone calls, parents alerted the college. Her roommate found her stabbed to death. The unusual motive was the key to solving the case.

14.title: Unmasking a Killer

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: Two young women found beaten in a Bethesda, MD, upscale shop present a mystery. Why is one dead and the other has only superficial wounds? Why the bewildering bloody footprints which end at the door? Can detectives see through the lies?

1.title: Mystery in the Desert

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Young lovers are found shot dead on a lovers' lane near Scottsdale, AZ, in 1962. Did a vengeful wife engineer her husband's conviction by substituting his fingerprints in the files? Did another man actually confess?

2.title: Innocent Witness

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: The only witness to a mother's murder is her 2-year old daughter. The accused confesses but alibi witnesses provide doubt. Is it enough? Prosecutors and the defense team feel they should check out another possible suspect first.

3.title: Dirty Secrets

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: A teenager disappears from her home in Lubbock, TX. Another young woman's body is found in their landfill in a suitcase. Wal-Mart video leads to the arrest of an unlikely killer. Could he also be responsible for both murders?

4.title: Over the Edge

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: When a van is found in the Blue Ridge Mountains with a dead woman's body in it, police conclude it was not an accident. Suspicion falls on her neighbors but perhaps the blame belongs closer to home.

5.title: Hanging by a Thread

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Hillsborough County Florida is in the midst of a horrifying crime spree. Young women are turning up dead every week. Can one teen age girl's bravery bring an end to a vicious killer's reign of terror?

6.title: The River's Edge

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Paula Zahn hosts this investigation of Stacy Fairchild, a 17-year-old who vanished unexpectedly from her Ohio home, last seen in a mall parking lot. The case baffles police for a long time, until they gain a lead on her possible killer. Zahn interviews a young woman who nearly became a victim of the same perpetrator.

7.title: A Deadly Betrayal

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: A beloved father of two is executed after a friendly poker game. Were the stakes too high? Or would police find the truth much closer to home?

8.title: No Exit

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: A young couple, out on the town in Washington D.C., is gunned down in a savage attack. Investigators are at a loss. Would it take another murder to solve the mystery?

9.title: Fatal Footage

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: A devoted mother vanishes on her way home from work. Her disappearance sends police into the darkest corners of the state and our justice system.

10.title: Vanished in the Night

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: After finding his beautiful 19 year old daughter dead, a father launches a relentless pursuit of her killer.

11.title: Taken

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: After 3 young girls are kidnapped and murdered, the killer kidnaps again. A young girl's heroic actions solve the case.

12.title: Murder at Bird Key

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: A successful business man is found brutally murdered in his palatial Southern Florida home. A mysterious backpack found at the crime scene is the key to the case.

1.title: A Tale Tell Call

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Mysterious calls to a dating service help police solve the murder of a beautiful young woman.

2.title: Painful Memories

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: A young marine comes home and finds his nine month pregnant wife savagely beaten in their bedroom. Was he an innocent victim or could he have been responsible for the terrible crime.

3.title: Profile of a Killer

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: When a beautiful young woman is found murdered in the basement of her brand new home, Police are forced to use cutting edge techniques to solve a terrifying mystery.

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: A devoted mother returns home from work and finds her 17-year-old daughter has been murdered. Was her killer the mysterious boyfriend she had written about in her journal?

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: A beautiful young mother is found murdered in the bedroom of her home. The only witness was her five year old son. Would he be able to help police solve the crime?

6.title: Snapshot to Murder

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: A high school student vanishes into thin air during a day studying in the park. Will a photograph from a nearby celebration help solve the case?

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: A small town hair dresser is found beaten and strangled in her beauty salon. After the investigation goes cold, an act of conscience cracks the case.

8.title: Murder at Sunrise

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: A beautiful young mother is found murdered while walking her dogs. Investigators suspect her killer is someone she knew. Twenty-six years latter police make an arrest but is he the right man?

9.title: The Day After Christmas

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: A man and his girlfriend are attacked by a mysterious intruder in their home. Despite near fatal wounds, she survives and helps investigators solve the crime.

10.title: One Month of Terror

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: After abducting a 17 year old girl in front of her home her kidnapper taunts the family with phone calls and disturbing letters. But a tiny mistake will eventually lead police to his door.

12.title: A Long Journey to Justice

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: A couple's daily walk ends in murder and a cloud of suspicion descends on the victim's family.

13.title: The Ultimate Sin

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: A man's crisis of conscience unravels a decades old mystery behind a young girl's murder.

14.title: Signed in Blood

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: In order to solve the vicious double murder of a beloved couple, police must uncover a cold blooded killer's carefully calculated plot

1.title: Tangled Web

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: A romantic Valentine's Day rendezvous ends in murder.

Finding his body later that morning, with their young son witnessing, wife Christie, 28, hysterically phones 911. Other than bullets, no clues appear to be left behind. It is only after a heavy, dark secret is revealed that justice can begin to be served for the senseless and deliberate ambush of Lee Sehorne.

11.title: Scattered Clues, Shattered Lives

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: After two terrifyingly similar crimes, just days apart, a wave of fear sweeps across Aurora Colorado. Can police stop a hammer wielding madman before he strikes again?

12.title: As She Lay Dying

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: A young mother is viciously stabbed in broad daylight. Will her final words provide police with the key to catching her killer?

13.title: River of Sorrow

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: A beautiful young woman is savagely murdered while fishing along the Platte River.

14.title: A Lifetime of Questions

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

14.plot: As a 4-year-old girl, Heidi Jones discovered her mother's lifeless body on the living room floor. As an adult she guides police on a relentless quest to find her mother's killer.

15.title: Last Night Before Murder

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

15.plot: A young mother inexplicably disappears in the middle of the night only to be found savagely murdered the next morning. Will retracing the tumultuous events of her last night alive lead police to her killer?

16.title: A Daughter's Quest

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

16.plot: A young woman's search for her birth mother ultimately leads her on a quest for justice.

-1.title: Stolen Dreams

episode of.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn (TV Series 2009– )

-1.plot: A young woman is found savagely murdered in her new home. Will the trail of clues police discovered lead them to her killer?

imdb.plot outline: Emmy Award-winning Journalist Paula Zahn steps out of the studio and into the field to unravel criminal investigations, tracking the drama of each story featuring those closest to the case including lawyers, detectives, the victim's family and the convicted murderer, themselves.
imdb.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn
plot: Award winning journalist 'Paula Zahn' (qv) unravels shocking crimes interviewing those closest to the case including lawyers, the victim's family, and detectives.

Emmy Award-winning Journalist 'Paula Zahn' (qv) steps out of the studio and into the field to unravel criminal investigations, tracking the drama of each story featuring those closest to the case including lawyers, detectives, the victim's family and the convicted murderer, themselves.::reidjack02

On the Case with 'Paula Zahn' (qv) will take viewers on a visually compelling journey into the most fascinating mysteries and criminal investigations. Personal stories from the victims' families, law enforcement and those closest to the case will guide the audience through every emotional twist and turn until justice is finally served.::Larry Israel
